item.title: Gee学习-路由测试编写
item.description: github地址: github.com/zhangzw001/learnGee 路由分析测试 package gee import ( "reflect" "testing" ) func TestParsePattern(t *testing.T) { tests := []struct { patterns string parts []string ok bool }{ {"/test/v1/add", []string{"test", "v1", "add"},true }, {"/test/*name/add", []string{"test", "*name"},true}, {"/test/:name", []string{"test", ":name"},true }, {"/test/:name/abc", []string{"test", ":name", "abc"},true}, {"/test/v1/add", []string{"testv1", "add"},false }, {"/test/*name/add", []string{"test", "*name","add"},false}, {"/test/:name", []string{"test", ":","name"},false }, {"/test/:name/abc", []string{"test", ":name"},false}, } m := make(map[string][]string) for _, test := range tests { m[test.patterns] = test.parts p := parsePattern(test.

item.title: Gin学习 简单记录form数据获取源码解读
item.description: http.request form 数据测试 func main() { e := gin.Default() e.Any("/test",func(c *gin.Context) { // 获取所有参数 _ = c.Request.ParseForm() // log.Println(c.Request.Header["Content-Type"]) // get form 参数, c.Request.URL.Query, err = url.ParseQuery log.Println(c.Request.URL.Query()) //log.Println(url.ParseQuery(c.Request.URL.RawQuery)) // post form 参数 log.Println(c.Request.PostForm) // form 参数 log.Println(c.Request.Form) }) e.Run("localhost:8123") } 请求日志 # curl -XPOST "http://localhost:8123/test" -d "abc=123&q=123&ccc=123123" 2021/01/13 14:31:30 map[] 2021/01/13 14:31:30 map[abc:[123] ccc:[123123] q:[123]] 2021/01/13 14:31:30 map[abc:[123] ccc:[123123] q:[123]] [GIN] 2021/01/13 - 14:31:30 | 200 | 339.
